dtliExcerpt: This handsome revival of Bertolt Brecht and Kurt Weill's caustic musical fable boasts a first-rate cast and some striking design elements, but it never quite achieves the theatrical snap that might make audiences forget they're watching a canonical work being dutifully revived.
showScoreExcerpt: This handsome revival of Bertolt Brecht and Kurt Weill's caustic musical fable boasts a first-rate cast and some striking design elements, but it never quite achieves the theatrical snap that might make audiences forget they're watching a canonical work being dutifully revived.
